What should I do if I have launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to this release?

If you have launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to this release, you should delete the following directories before running this new update:

* On Linux: `~/.komodo/vrsctest`
* On MacOS: `⁨Users⁩/⁨{YourUserName}/⁨Library⁩/⁨Application Support⁩/⁨Komodo/vrsctest`
* On Windows: `"%APPDATA%"\Komodo\VRSCTEST`

Why might antivirus software flag this software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP"?
Antivirus software might flag this software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" because it includes mining software, which could be installed by a third party to exploit your PC. This is a false positive.
